info.name: Baroni Admin Management APIs
info.description: Complete API collection for admin management endpoints including user management, star management, review management, and reported users management

query.description: Filter: 'today' for today's metrics, or use 'from' and 'to' for date range

request.description: Returns metrics: totalCurrentJackpot, paidToday (count & amount), pending (count & amount), failed (count & amount)

query.description: Boolean: true to filter today's requests only
ISO 8601 date for date range start
ISO 8601 date for date range end
Search by star name or baroniId

request.description: List all withdrawal requests. Returns items with: id, status, uiStatus (paid/pending/failed), amount, commissionAmount, netAmount, errorMessage, star details, operatorId, formattedDate
List only failed (rejected) withdrawal requests with error messages

variable.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the withdrawal request

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific withdrawal request including star details, wallet balance, commission calculations, and error messages

variable.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the withdrawal request

request.description: Approve a pending withdrawal request. This will process the payment and deduct from star's jackpot balance. Only pending requests can be approved.

variable.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the withdrawal request

request.description: Reject a pending withdrawal request. Reason is required and will be shown as error message. Only pending requests can be rejected.

variable.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the failed withdrawal request

request.description: Retry payment for a failed/rejected withdrawal request. Only rejected requests can be retried. On success, status changes to approved. Validates balance before retry.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Emma Johnson",
  "pseudo": "emma_j",
  "email": "emma@example.com",
  "contact": "+1234567890",
  "profilePic": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
  "country": "USA",
  "profession": "PROFESSION_ID_HERE",
  "about": "Award-winning actress and voice artist with over 10 years of experience. I love connecting with fans and creating special moments.",
  "location": "Hollywood",
  "availableForBookings": true,
  "hidden": false,
  "appNotification": true
}

{
  "appName": "Baroni",
  "appVersion": "1.0.0",
  "maintenanceMode": false,
  "registrationEnabled": true,
  "maxFileSize": 5242880,
  "supportedImageFormats": ["jpg", "jpeg", "png", "gif"],
  "supportedVideoFormats": ["mp4", "mov", "avi"],
  "defaultLanguage": "en",
  "supportedLanguages": ["en", "fr", "es"],
  "defaultCurrency": "USD",
  "supportedCurrencies": ["USD", "EUR", "GBP"],
  "maxCoinsPerTransaction": 10000,
  "minCoinsPerTransaction": 1,
  "commissionRate": 0.1,
  "paymentGatewayEnabled": true,
  "notificationEnabled": true,
  "analyticsEnabled": true,
  "debugMode": false
}

{
  "title": "New Year Special Event",
  "description": "Celebrate New Year with your favorite stars",
  "type": "promotional",
  "startDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "endDate": "2024-01-07T23:59:59.000Z",
  "targetAudience": "all",
  "targetCountry": "USA",
  "priority": "high",
  "budget": 5000,
  "image": "https://example.com/event-image.jpg",
  "link": "https://example.com/event-link"
}

formdata.value: The app crashes when I try to book a video call with a star
